enableOrganizer.name: Enable Organizer
enableOrganizer.description[zh_CN]: 用于开启/关闭自动整理
enableOrganizer.description: It's used to control whether to enable the Organizer.

enableVisibility.name: Enable Visibility
enableVisibility.description[zh_CN]: 用于开启/关闭启用集合可见性
enableVisibility.description: Used to turn on/off enabling collection visibility.

hideAllKeySeq.name: Hide All KeySeq
hideAllKeySeq.description[zh_CN]: 集合隐藏的快捷键字符串

hideAllDialogRepeatNoMore.name: Repeat No More
hideAllDialogRepeatNoMore.description[zh_CN]: 用于开启/关闭隐藏集合的提示对话框
hideAllDialogRepeatNoMore.description: Prompt dialog for turning on/off hidden collections.

organizeAction.name: Organize action
organizeAction.description[zh_CN]: 单次整理（0）或自动整理（1），当选择单次整理时，整理行为仅在用户触发整理时发生，新建的文件不会被整理到集合中
organizeAction.description: Single-time organization (0) or automatic organization (1): When single-time organization is selected, the organization action only occurs when triggered by the user, and newly created files will not be organized into the collection.

organizeCategories.name: Organize categories
organizeCategories.description[zh_CN]: 将会被整理的文件类型，可选项为：应用（kApp）、文档（kDocument）、图片（kPicture）、视频（kVideo）、文件夹（kFolder）以及其他（kOther）
organizeCategories.description: The types of files that will be organized, options: applications (kApp), documents (kDocument), pictures (kPicture), videos (kVideo), folders (kFolder), and other (kOther)

collectionMovingOptimize.name: Optimize moving performance
collectionMovingOptimize.description[zh_CN]: 提升低性能设备上，集合移动时的性能效果，开启此开关，将减少集合移动过程中的卡顿现象。
collectionMovingOptimize.description: Improve the performance effect when moving the collection on low performance devices, turn on this switch, it will reduce the lag phenomenon during the collection moving.
